channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: All Lights shut off in the park, 27th February
item.description:
Very dangerous and unsafe to walk through in the park now And now I hear antisocial activities as all the park streetlights are turned off so it's pitch black

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Haymarket II - Street Lamp 17 flickering, 27th February
item.description:
Haymarket Street, facing His Majesty's Theatre. Lamppost (17) is flickering - looking to report this our end.

item.title: Speeding, 27th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Axminster Crescent, East Wickham, Greater London

item.title: Abandoned car, 27th February
item.description:

item.title: Motor garaged and repairing of vehicles on public road., 27th February
item.description:
This problem has been there for years. Four motor garages and tyre mart in this small residential avenue. Noisy, dirty abusive environment. Not bothered about the residents. In addition illegal repair on our public road not at all worried about the law and order. We wonder where the traffic warden is when these are happening. Untaxed vehicles are parked and repaired and the very next minute I report to the authorities, the vehicles go missing?
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Park Avenue, Edmonton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The paved area which is large at the junction of Goddard Road, 27th February
item.description:
This area could be greatly improved with the addition of hanging planters or large planters filled with flowers, this is an unused area that could even have some benches/seating with huge planters. It could be a more communal stop for local residents to chat and enjoy
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Croydon Road, Elmers End, Greater London
